comments.comments_text: Goal! A great cross from Moussa Diaby finds Kai Havertz (Bayer Leverkusen), who scores with a simple header into an empty net. 0:1.

comments.comments_text: Leonardo Bittencourt (Werder Bremen) goes over to take the corner kick and it looks like he will swing the ball into the penalty box.

comments.comments_text: It's a goal! Leonardo Bittencourt delivers a teasing cross from the resulting corner and the ball falls into the space where Theodor Gebre Selassie (Werder Bremen) is lurking. His precise shot from close range goes into the bottom right corner and it's 1:1.

comments.comments_text: Superbly taken set piece! Kerem Demirbay takes the free kick and sends a cross into the six-yard box. Kai Havertz (Bayer Leverkusen) flicks the ball lightly with his head towards the middle of the goal. Jiri Pavlenka can't react quickly enough and the score changes to 1:2.

comments.comments_text: Moussa Diaby showcases his great technique and produces a beautiful lofted cross into the box. Mitchell Weiser (Bayer Leverkusen) meets the cross and gets himself onto the scoresheet with a header into the bottom left corner. It's 1:3.
